entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Near blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Near blizzard developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of near blizzard then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
